articles.description: Tiger Shroff and Kriti Sanon's film is hardly minting any money at the box office. It has earned Rs 11 crore till now.
articles.content: Tiger Shroff and Kriti Sanon made their big Bollywood debut together with the 2014 release 'Heropanti'. The duo received praise for their chemistry in the hit film. However, the same can't be said fo… [+1470 chars]
